pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy | SapphireHotel SapphireHotel Home About us Casino Сontact Privacy Policy At SapphireHotel, we are committed to protecting the privacy of our guests and visitors. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information. We may collect various types of information from you, including personal information such as your name, contact details, payment information, and preferences. Additionally, we may collect non-personal information such as browser type, IP address, and browsing patterns. Your information is primarily used to provide and personalize our services to you. This includes processing reservations, improving our services, communicating with you, and ensuring the security of our premises. We may share your information with trusted third parties such as service providers and business partners to facilitate our operations and provide you with tailored services. We do not sell your personal information to third parties. We implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure. We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze trends, administer the website, and gather demographic information. You can control cookies through your browser settings. Our website may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not operated by us. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these third parties. SapphireHotel@gmail.com. Our services are not directed to individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children without parental consent. With your consent, we may send you marketing communications about promotions, events, and special offers. You can opt-out of these communications at any time. Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own, where data protection laws may be different. By using our services, you consent to such transfers. You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can update your information by contacting us directly. We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices and legal requirements. We encourage you to review this Policy periodically. SapphireHotel@gmail.com. If you have any questions, concerns, or complaints about our Privacy Policy or practices, you can contact us using the information provided at the end of this document. By using our services, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your information as described in this Privacy Policy. We will retain your personal data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, including for the purposes of satisfying any legal, accounting, or reporting requirements. You have the right to request access to and rectification or erasure of your personal data, as well as the right to restrict or object to the processing of your data in certain circumstances. We have implemented appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure a level of security appropriate to the risk to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. We do not use automated decision-making processes without human intervention, including profiling, which produces legal effects concerning you or similarly significantly affects you. If you believe that your data protection rights have been breached, you have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority. Home About us Casino Сontact Privacy policy Terms and conditions Disclaimer © 2024 SapphireHotel. All rights reserved.

pages.about: About SapphireHotel - A Legacy of Luxury and Excellence SapphireHotel Home About us Casino Сontact About Casino-Hotel Our luxurious rooms and suites are meticulously designed to provide the utmost comfort and style, ensuring a memorable stay for every guest. From modern amenities to stunning views, each aspect of our accommodations reflects our commitment to excellence. Step onto our dynamic casino floor, where you can indulge in a variety of gaming options, including classic table games, state-of-the-art slot machines, and exclusive VIP lounges. Our casino provides an electrifying atmosphere where luck meets opportunity. Savor culinary delights at our diverse restaurants and bars, where talented chefs craft innovative dishes using the finest ingredients. Whether you're craving gourmet cuisine or casual bites, our dining venues offer something to satisfy every palate. Over 500 Our casino boasts a diverse selection of over 500 games, including classic favorites like blackjack and roulette, as well as cutting-edge slot machines and progressive jackpots. Whether you're a seasoned player or a novice, there's a game to suit every taste and skill level. 300+ Enjoy luxury and comfort in our 300+ rooms and suites, each designed with sophisticated decor and modern amenities. From spacious suites with stunning views to cozy rooms perfect for a weekend getaway, we offer accommodations tailored to elevate your stay. 5 Indulge in a culinary journey with our five distinct restaurants and bars, offering a range of dining experiences from fine dining to casual fare. From gourmet steakhouses to lively cocktail lounges, each venue is crafted to satisfy every palate and occasion. 200+ Experience excitement year-round with over 200 entertainment events hosted annually at our casino-hotel. From live music performances and comedy shows to themed parties and special promotions, there's always something happening to enhance your visit. The Story of Our Casino-Hotel Our casino-hotel is more than just a place to stay and play—it's a journey into luxury, excitement, and unparalleled hospitality. Nestled in the heart of Indian, our establishment has been a beacon of entertainment and sophistication since its inception. Dining at our casino-hotel is a culinary journey like no other. Our world-class restaurants and bars offer a spectrum of flavors and experiences, from gourmet fine dining to casual bites and vibrant nightlife. Whether you're savoring a perfectly aged steak or enjoying handcrafted cocktails with friends, every meal is a celebration of taste and refinement. Beyond gaming and dining, our casino-hotel is a hub of entertainment and excitement. From live performances by renowned artists to themed parties and special events, there's always something happening to enhance your stay and create lasting memories. From the moment you step through our doors, you're enveloped in an atmosphere of elegance and excitement. Our meticulously designed lobby welcomes you with opulent décor and a sense of grandeur, setting the stage for an unforgettable experience. Each room and suite within our casino-hotel is a sanctuary of comfort and style, offering modern amenities and breathtaking views of the city skyline or surrounding landscapes. Whether you're here for a weekend getaway or an extended stay, our accommodations are designed to exceed your expectations. Our casino floor is a playground of possibilities, featuring an extensive array of gaming options that cater to every taste and skill level. From classic table games to the latest slot machines and exclusive high-stakes rooms, the thrill of chance awaits at every turn. The Core Values We Believe In At our casino-hotel, we uphold a set of core values that define who we are and guide everything we do. These values are not just principles; they are the foundation of our commitment to excellence, integrity, and guest satisfaction. Learn more Excellence We strive for excellence in every aspect of our operations, from the quality of our accommodations and dining experiences to the level of service we provide. We continuously innovate and improve to exceed expectations and set new standards of luxury and hospitality. Integrity Integrity is at the heart of our casino-hotel. We conduct ourselves with honesty, transparency, and ethical behavior in all interactions, both with our guests and within our team. Trust is paramount, and we uphold the highest standards of integrity in every decision and action we take. Guest Satisfaction We prioritize guest satisfaction above all else. Every guest interaction is an opportunity to create a positive and memorable experience. We listen to feedback, anticipate needs, and go above and beyond to ensure that every guest feels valued and appreciated. Innovation We embrace innovation as a catalyst for growth and improvement. We are forward-thinking and proactive in adopting new technologies, trends, and ideas to enhance our offerings and stay ahead in the competitive landscape of hospitality and entertainment. I especially enjoyed the variety of dining options and the vibrant atmosphere of the casino floor."
